ldmx::DefaultDetectorID

ldmx::DefaultDetectorID Class Reference

Defines a default detector ID with encoded layer and subdetector values. More...

 DefaultDetectorID ()

Detailed Description

Defines a default detector ID with encoded layer and subdetector values.

Note:
This class provides access to a subdetector ID and layer number.
